Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Darrell Yates Rist, NYU student David Strah, and Jim Levin, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2. Announcement of GCN Pledge Month3. Discussion of Brooklyn College refusal to give award to anti-gay Catholic Bishop Francis J. Mugavero, the political backlash against Brooklyn College's decision, and how the gay community can confront religious bigotryCOMMERCIAL: GCN Fundraiser4. Condom availability in prisons and in colleges, whether condoms are "catching on"COMMERCIAL: Human Rights Campaign Fund5. Andy Humm on the necessity of activists and volunteers in the gay community6. News Watch, anti-gay psychologist Paul Cameron changes the name of his organization to "The Family Research Institute"7. Oklahoma, Republican Party platform is anti-gay, despite the Republican governor's approval of sex education in schools8. Hollywood, television shows and films win awards at the Alliance for Gay and Lesbian Artists awards for positive portrayals of gay characters9. Dallas police arm selves with gloves, masks, and insect repellent due to fear of contracting AIDS10. Clips from a speech by New York Governor Mario Cuomo, on the passage of an executive order for the protection of gay and lesbian employeesCOMMERCIAL: Dancing Cheek to Cheek GCN event11. Lavender Health, interview with Damien Martin, co-founder of the Institute for the Protection of Lesbian and Gay Youth and Professor at New York University, about specific needs in educating gay youths12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, short stories and clip of Mayor Koch talking about Ronald Reagan's inactivity regarding AIDS fundingCOMMERCIAL: GCN Fundraiser2. Naming Names, criticism of Max Frankel of the New York Times3. Episode 5 of GCN's soap opera, "Suds": "A Brief Crisis"4. Closing credits
